API name: Parrot Flower Power Sensor Data Indirect API v6.0
Description: This API provides access to sensor data using the Flower Power Cloud and returns Get Samples for Location, Obtain Sync Data and Obtain garden location statuses. The Parrot Pot is a smart flowerpot that helps your plants with a self-watering system and four built-in sensors that monitor light, temperature, soil moisture and fertilizer levels in real time. It sends out customized recommendations and alerts to help you better care for your plants.
